p: The JoX is an open access journal, facilitating the accessibility of published articles among the scientific community, including research professionals and students, in the most efficient manner. The Editorial Board includes worldwide experts in different fields: natural and herbal medicinal products, drug therapeutics and biotransformation, clinical safety, occurrence and persistence of xenobiotics in the environment, nanotoxicology and ecotoxicology. The board members were handpicked to favor a multidisciplinary view of xenobiotics and were carefully selected across the planet to favor the best international perspective and audience for this open access journal.
